about_the_game:
You appeared in this world, in an empty hub connecting four distinct areas. You don't know who or what you are, and there's just a lot of different levels that can become really interesting and challenging to go through.



Blockits is a single-player platformer in a world with different areas to explore and levels to beat. There isn't any other life form sharing the same locations with you. It focuses on gameplay and the exploration experience, so feel free to try going off the main route, maybe you'll find something interesting along the way.

Blockits is a game with almost no text, so it can be played by anyone regardless of their spoken language.
